Articles.Content: My kerbal space program wont start. I really want to play so bad on the new update... It says "Failed to intialize player" and "Could....not preload global game manager #0 i=0" Can somebody please help me?

Please read the Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide. It will tell you where to find a lot of useful information so that someone could help you.

Also, welcome to the forums!
From just that error, it sounds as though your game files are corrupted. You may have to try redownloading.
No, you can download it as often as you want.
It doesn't cost anything...assuming you don't have a maximum cap on your internet usage.
